org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 RedisTxCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    DefaultedRedisClusterConnection, DefaultedRedisConnection, RedisClusterConnection, RedisCommands, RedisConnection, StringRedisConnection
    所有已知实现类:
    org.springframework.data.redis.connection.AbstractRedisConnection, DefaultStringRedisConnection, JedisClusterConnection, JedisConnection, LettuceClusterConnection, LettuceConnection

    public interface RedisTxCommands
    Transaction/Batch specific commands supported by Redis.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void discard()
      Discard all commands issued after multi().
      List<Object> exec()
      Executes all queued commands in a transaction started with multi().
      void multi()
      Mark the start of a transaction block.
      void unwatch()
      Flushes all the previously #watch(byte[]...) keys.
      void watch(byte[]... keys)
      Watch given keys for modifications during transaction started with multi().

    • 方法详细资料

      • multi

        void multi()
        Mark the start of a transaction block.
        Commands will be queued and can then be executed by calling exec() or rolled back using discard()

        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: MULTI

      • exec

        List<Object> exec()
        Executes all queued commands in a transaction started with multi().
        If used along with #watch(byte[]...) the operation will fail if any of watched keys has been modified.
        返回:
        List of replies for each executed command.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: EXEC

      • discard

        void discard()
        Discard all commands issued after multi().
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: DISCARD

      • watch

        void watch(byte[]... keys)
        Watch given keys for modifications during transaction started with multi().
        参数:
        keys - must not be null.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: WATCH

      • unwatch

        void unwatch()
        Flushes all the previously #watch(byte[]...) keys.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: UNWATCH
